nodes.text: Miat Temm was a female Human who served as one of Grand Admiral Gilad Pellaeon's civilian aides during the early period of the Yuuzhan Vong War. She was Force-sensitive, and used this ability to shield her thoughts from other users of the Force.
She met with Leia Organa Solo on Bastion in 25 ABY, when the latter was seeking the Imperial Remnant's aid in helping the New Republic fight the Yuuzhan Vong.
